name: Eat Me (itch)
description: Join the fun with candy corn in a race to the top of the wafer mountain... A surprise awaits you all Controls Player 1: WASD + SpaceKey Player 2: Not Implemented yet Disclaimer Loading Takes time .. just wait and dont smash your mouse alot You might suffer some FPS drops, it's on You... and yes the game is not optimized but I don't care - CD Project Red 3:) Requirements Disk space : 1 GB Ram : 4 GB at least GPU : Any proper well functioning GPU that is not Intel and not made in 1999
